attributes.action: Honour the Television Presenter Paul O Grady in the New Year Honours List
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
WITHOUT PREDJUDICE

FOR THE ATTENTION OF THE RIGHT HONOURABLE GORDON BROWN, PRIME MINISTER OF GREAT BRITAIN.

I believe that the TV Presenter Paul O Grady should be honoured in either the New Years Honours List or The Queens Birthday List in recognition for his services to Entertainment/Television. I feel that he does so much for charity that he should in some way be honoured.

I would therefore be most greatful if you consider my petition for approval.
